column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " I used to kind of look up to pirates , but those guys are terrible . "
#Text=Katara says : " I know .
#Text=" Katara says : " Is n't it great ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " No wonder they were trying to hack us up !
#Text=You stole their waterbending scroll !
#Text=" Katara says : " I prefer to think of it as high risk trading .
#Text=" Aang says : " Good one , Katara .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka , where do you think they got it ?
#Text=They stole it from a waterbender !
#Text=" Sokka says : " It does n't matter .
#Text=You put all of our lives in danger just so you could learn some stupid , fancy splashes .
#Text=" Katara says : " These are real waterbending forms .
#Text=You know how crucial it is for Aang to learn waterbending !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Whatever .
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , what 's done is done .
#Text=We have it , we might as well learn from it .
#Text="
